function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of redundancy in critical supply chains and services","Impact":"Critical shortages in household supplies, food, and PPE for healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Research and implement supply chain redundancies for critical supplies","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems","People":"Household consumers, healthcare workers","Owner":"Supply chain managers, researchers"},{"Description":"Vulnerability to zoonotic disease emergence","Impact":"Potential outbreak of zoonotic diseases due to threshold density of susceptible hosts","Mitigation":"Invest in human capital, networked relationships, and multi-level governance to enhance social adaptive capacity","Technologies":"Social network analysis tools, governance platforms","People":"Communities, public health organizations","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate social adaptive capacity to respond to disturbances","Impact":"Inability to effectively respond to system jolts and shocks, such as the emergence of zoonotic diseases","Mitigation":"Invest in human capital, networked relationships, and institutionalize multi-level governance","Technologies":"Network analysis tools, governance platforms","People":"Communities, public health organizations","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations"}]}
